title: Why are Creative Engineering so ****ing incompetent?

posts.content:
Oh No...
The products are good
The customer service is poor
The attitude is Attrocious.

Ordered some rubbers last week to redo my door tops. Website was in changeover mode so I called and spoke to Mandy. Package went out the next day and arrived yesterday in Holland. Never did get the promised invoice but I've got my stuff. A bit weird transaction but pretty happy so far.

I've never had a problem with these guys and they've always been more than helpful, its always been a fantastic service too. maybe just the luck of the draw? as for other companies...... cheap nasty repro rubbish sent as 'top quality'

Brought the rear safari for my dc a year ago. Been told the safari frame has problem of popping off, I never believe until now. Emailed Mandy but still got no reply for 3 days... umm, I wish CE shop were just 2 blocks far from where I live.

Do they have after sale service?
Its the helicopter glue they use!!! 3 days! Sit back, wait, and grow a beard!!
